923: Ref ID: 00490-0012674322 Classification: Document Controller Compensation: $19.79 to $22.91 hourly Job Summary: We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Document Control Specialist to manage our company's document control processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of document control procedures and regulations, as well as excellent communication and organizational skills. Key Responsibilities: Develop, implement, and maintain document control processes and procedures Manage and organize company documents and records Ensure accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of documentation Review and approve documents for release Maintain document revisions and distribution logs Track and maintain document status throughout the document lifecycle Provide training and support to employees on document control procedures Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements Maintain confidentiality and security of all documents Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field or equivalent experience 2+ years of experience in document control or related field Strong knowledge of document control procedures and regulations Experience with electronic document management systems Excellent communication and organizational skills Attention to detail and accuracy Ability to work independently and collaboratively Strong computer skills, including proficiency in Microsoft Office
